Posts.Title: Is burning and pain a sign.

Posts.Content: I'm having very stronge burning sensations and pain in my left breast, but no lump, is that a sign of breast cancer.
Posts.Title: Is burning and pain a sign.

Posts.Content: I am really sorry about your sister,and i'll keep you in my prayers too. i have seen a doctor and i'm going for test in a few days,i hope it's not what i suspect, but i'm keeping my hopes up and praying for the best,thank you for sharing your experience with me.and again i am deeply sorry for your lost,i too lost a sister, an one of my sons, but it wasn't from cancer, i just know the pain of losing a loved one all to well, my condolences to you and your family.
Posts.Title: Is burning and pain a sign.

Posts.Content: On 9/13/2007 LoveMyHonda wrote:   On 9/13/2007 aprilmayspring wrote: I'm having very strong burning sensations and pain in my left breast, but no lump, is that a sign of breast cancer. Inflammatory breast cancer can present as swelling, itching, burning, and pinkish coloration, to name a few symptoms. There would not be a lump in the case of IBC. You should see a breast specialist immediately.    thank you very much for the information, i'm seeing a specialist next Monday. I just pray that i'm catching it early enough if cancer is what it is.is there other breast conditions that can cause these symptoms
Posts.Title: Is burning and pain a sign.
